channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsom at UN climate summit says Trump is "doubling down on stupid"

item.title: U.S. and Saudi Arabia working to finalize defense pact before MBS meets Trump
item.description: U.S. and Saudi officials have been holding intense negotiations to finalize a broad set of agreements, including a defense pact, ahead of next week's ...

item.title: Jack Schlossberg, JFK's grandson, enters N.Y. race to replace Nadler in Congress
item.description: Jack Schlossberg , President John F. Kennedy's only grandson, is running for Congress in New York — launching a campaign to replace retiring Rep. Jerr...

item.title: Trump defends H-1B visas: "You don't have certain talents" in the U.S.
item.description: President Trump said in a Fox News interview that aired Sunday evening H-1B skilled worker visas are necessary because "you don't have certain talents...

item.title: Influential study sees "less momentum" on cutting global CO2 emissions
item.description: Global oil and gas demand is projected to keep rising through 2050 under nations' current policies despite growth in renewables and electric cars, the...

item.title: ‘Not an easy call’: The Democrats who struggled with their shutdown vote
item.description: A significant bloc of Senate Democrats opposed the controversial vote but are glad the stalemate has ended.

item.title: Trump airport nominee wants to eliminate Dulles ‘people movers’
item.description: The unique shuttles, which have been in operation since 1962, have been blamed for delays and accidents. A White House official Tuesday called them “n...

item.title: How federal agents sent by Trump helped slow crime in Memphis
item.description: A federal task force has helped lower crime and boost arrests in Memphis. But residents say they feel under siege and have complained about racial pro...

item.title: Kennedy grandson Jack Schlossberg announces 2026 congressional bid
item.description: The grandson of John F. Kennedy is running as a Democrat to replace Rep. Jerry Nadler in New York’s 12th Congressional District.

item.title: Schumer opposed the shutdown deal. Some Democrats still want him out.
item.description: Some Democrats argue Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer (New York) is not doing enough to stand up to President Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
